there should be 16 16 17 sl sts turn heel all sl sts should be slipped purlwise from this point on working on heel flap stitches continue as follows row 1 rs sl 1 k17 20 22 ssk k1 turn row 2 ws sl 1 p5 7 7 p2tog p1 turn row 3 sl 1 k6 8 8 ssk k1 turn row 4 sl 1 p7 9 9 p2tog p1 turn row 5 sl 1 k8 10 10 ssk k1 turn row 6 sl 1 p9 11 11 p2tog p1 turn row 7 sl 1 k10 12 12 ssk k1 turn row 8 sl 1 p11 13 13 p2tog p1 turn row 9 sl 1 k12 14 14 ssk k1 turn row 10 sl 1 p13 15 15 p2tog p1 turn row 11 sl 1 k14 16 16 ssk k1 turn row 12 sl 1 p15 17 17 p2tog p1 turn size 1 only row 13 rs sl 1 k16 ssk turn row 14 ws sl 1 p16 p2tog turn ~ 18 sts size 2 and 3 only row 13 rs sl 1 k18 18 ssk k1 turn row 14 ws sl 1 p19 19 p2tog k1 turn ~ 22 26 sts size 3 only row 15 rs sl 1 k20 ssk k1 turn row 16 ws sl 1 p21 p2tog k1 turn ~ 24 sts page 3 of 4 © sachiko burgin 2020 sachikoburgin@gmail com needleleafknitscom pattern is for personal use copy and images cannot be reproduced or distributed without author consent humber socks all sizes again re-establish working in rounds next row rs k9 11 12 heel sts with an empty needle knit remaining 9 11 12 sts and with that same needle pick up and knit 16 16 17 sts along the selvage edge of heel flap working into sl sts next needle
